    • Method Detail

      • create

        net.trajano.doxdb.DoxMeta create(java.lang.String collectionName,
                               org.bson.BsonDocument contents)
        Creates a dox record into the database. This will allocate a "_id" value for the record.
        Parameters:
        collectionName - collection name
        contents - dox contents as a BSON. The contents MUST be valid for the schema.
        Returns:
        dox meta with contents with "_id" and "_version" set.

      • delete

        void delete(java.lang.String collection,
          net.trajano.doxdb.DoxID doxID,
          int version)

      • noop

        void noop()
        Does nothing, but calling it ensures that the EJB gets initialized.

      • update

        net.trajano.doxdb.DoxMeta update(java.lang.String collection,
                               net.trajano.doxdb.DoxID id,
                               org.bson.BsonDocument contents,
                               int version)
        Creates a dox record into the database. This will allocate a "_id" value for the record.
        Parameters:
        collectionName - collection name
        contents - dox contents as a BSON. The contents MUST be valid for the schema.
        Returns:
        dox meta with contents with "_id" and "_version" set.
